title: Why riot why....
body: Okay, ive been put into a game as sup and the game stops/freezes for some reason and i just think its loading then i get a message saying i need to reconnect and then i do and it turns out that the game got remade and i got afk marked and now i have 5 20 minute wait times.... it wasn't my fault since i didnt disconnect my internet was fine and nothing was wrong with my computer, there needs to be some way for me to get these removed like its completely unfair, the only times i have been afk in the past while is through the client crashing or something like that and its getting on my nerves, like help please this is getting far too annoying and out of hand its happening far more now than ever in the past, thank you.

replies.body: Even if it's not intentional, [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) will treat everyone equally because constantly leaving causes others negative experiences.  It sounds like you're having some connection problems staying in game, so our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help with that.  Make sure to go over every step and to test it in custom games to prevent any penalties.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I have checked out these and none of the seem to fit the case i am having, when i go into the champion pick and after pick my champion i go into the screen that shows all of the players and the splash arts, it loads me up to 99 or 100 percent and stays there, i just think its being slow but when i check and alt+tab to a different screen i see that an error message appears and then goes away after about 2-3 seconds, this has happened twice as a result leaverbuster, a total of 1h:40m wait time
rito ever time i play a game there one afk
